code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant browser
    participant server

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/spa/
    activate server
    server-->>browser: HTML document
    deactivate server

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/main.css
    activate server
    server-->>browser: the css file
    deactivate server

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/spa.js
    activate server
    server-->>browser: the JavaScript file
    deactivate server

    Note right of browser: The browser starts executing the JavaScript code that fetches the JSON from the server

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/data.json
    activate server
    server-->>browser: [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController}, ... ]
    deactivate server

    Note right of browser: The browser executes the callback function that renders the notes

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 相较于方案A，GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/spa/、GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/main.css有更好的性能。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 相较于方案A，GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/spa/、GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/main.css有更好的性能。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/spa.js、GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/data.json完成整个流程。
